translations: 喋喋不休的废话；行话；啪嗒啪嗒的声音（patter 的复数形式）
啪嗒啪嗒地响；喋喋不休；轻轻拍打（patter 的三单形式）

sentences.sentence: What constantly recurs to me is "The rain patters, the leaf quivers."[1]
sentences.translation: 我时常能记起的是“天上淅沥下雨，树叶婆娑摇曳”。

sentences.sentence: So there were patterns, there were objects first and people started to understand patters.
sentences.translation: 因此，先有了对象，然后人们才开始了解模式。

sentences.sentence: Distractions can severely interrupt your reading patters and decrease your comprehension of the text.
sentences.translation: 分心可能会严重地干扰你的阅读思维模式，降低你对内容的理解。
